pages.about: About Us - Majestic Roll Hotel 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts About Us HOME - ABOUT US About Majestic Roll Hotel Majestic Roll Hotel is a symbol of luxury and sophistication. Nestled in the heart of the city, our hotel offers an unparalleled experience for those seeking comfort, elegance, and exceptional service. Our meticulously designed rooms and suites provide the perfect blend of classic charm and modern amenities, ensuring a comfortable and memorable stay for every guest. Our hotel features a variety of world-class amenities, including a stunning pool, a fully-equipped fitness center, and a range of exquisite dining options. Whether you're here for a relaxing getaway or a special event, our dedicated team is committed to providing the highest level of service and hospitality. Order Exquisite Dining Experience At Majestic Roll Hotel, we believe that dining should be an experience to savor. Our hotel boasts several restaurants, each offering a unique culinary journey. From gourmet fine dining to casual eateries, our diverse menus cater to every palate and preference. Our signature restaurant, The Golden Plate, is renowned for its innovative cuisine and exceptional service. Here, you can indulge in a variety of dishes crafted from the freshest local ingredients, all prepared by our world-class chefs. For those seeking a more relaxed atmosphere, our Bistro Lounge offers a selection of light bites and refreshing beverages, perfect for a casual meal or an evening of socializing. Order Spa and Wellness Rejuvenate your mind, body, and spirit at the Majestic Roll Hotel Spa. Our luxurious spa offers a range of treatments and therapies designed to promote relaxation and well-being. From soothing massages to revitalizing facials, our experienced therapists are dedicated to providing a personalized and tranquil spa experience. Our spa features state-of-the-art facilities, including private treatment rooms, a serene relaxation lounge, and a fully-equipped fitness center. Whether you're looking to unwind after a busy day or embark on a comprehensive wellness journey, our spa is the perfect retreat for ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation. Order What Our Guests Say "Staying at Majestic Roll Hotel was an unforgettable experience. The service was impeccable, and the amenities were top-notch. I can't wait to return!" - John D. "The perfect blend of luxury and comfort. The spa treatments were heavenly, and the dining options were exquisite. Highly recommend!" - Emily R. "A true oasis in the city. The staff were incredibly attentive, and the rooms were beautifully appointed. A five-star experience!" - Michael S. Events and Conferences Majestic Roll Hotel is the ideal venue for your next event or conference. Our state-of-the-art facilities can accommodate gatherings of all sizes, from intimate meetings to large-scale conferences. Our dedicated event planning team is on hand to ensure every detail is perfect, providing a seamless experience for you and your guests. With our elegant ballrooms, modern conference rooms, and versatile outdoor spaces, we offer a variety of options to suit your needs. Each space is equipped with the latest technology and amenities to support your event, ensuring a successful and memorable occasion. Discover Local Attractions Located in the heart of the city, Majestic Roll Hotel offers easy access to a wealth of local attractions. Explore the vibrant cultural scene, visit renowned museums and galleries, or enjoy shopping at exclusive boutiques. Our concierge team is happy to assist with recommendations and arrangements to make your stay even more enjoyable. For outdoor enthusiasts, the area offers beautiful parks and scenic trails, perfect for a leisurely stroll or an invigorating run. Whether you're interested in art, history, shopping, or nature, there's something for everyone just steps from our door. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Majestic Roll Hotel 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy Policy At Majestic Roll Hotel, we value your privacy and are dedicated to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or stay at our hotel. By accessing our services, you agree to the practices described in this policy. 1. Information Collection We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services. This includes: Personal Identification: Your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address are collected when you make a reservation or sign up for our newsletter. Booking Details: Information related to your reservations, such as stay dates, room preferences, and payment information. Guest Preferences: Details about your preferences and interests to personalize your stay, such as dietary needs, special requests, and feedback. Website Usage Data: Information about your interactions with our website, including IP address, browser type, and browsing behavior. 2. Use of Your Information We use your personal data for the following purposes: Reservation Management: To confirm and manage your bookings and provide the services you request. Service Personalization: To tailor our services to meet your preferences and enhance your overall experience. Communication: To contact you regarding your bookings, respond to your inquiries, and send important updates about our services. Marketing: To send you promotional offers and updates about our hotel, subject to your consent to receive such communications. Legal Compliance: To comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements. 3. Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted partners under specific circumstances, such as: Service Providers: Partners who assist us in operating our hotel, processing payments, and delivering services to you. Legal Requirements: When required by law or in response to legal processes. Protection: To protect the rights, property, or safety of Majestic Roll Hotel, our guests, or others. 4. Data Security We implement various security measures to protect your personal data, including: Encryption: Using advanced encryption technologies to secure data during transmission. Access Controls: Restricting access to personal data to authorized personnel only. Monitoring: Regularly monitoring our systems for vulnerabilities and potential threats. 5. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. This allows us to provide continuous service and comply with legal obligations. 6. Your Rights You have several rights regarding your personal data, including: Access: The right to request access to the personal data we hold about you. Correction: The right to request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete data. Deletion: The right to request deletion of your personal data under certain conditions. Objection: The right to object to the processing of your data in specific circumstances. Data Portability: The right to request the transfer of your data to another organization or directly to you, under certain conditions. 7. Policy Updates We may update this privacy policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any significant changes will be posted on our website along with the updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy regularly to stay informed about how we protect your information. 8. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at: Email: majesticrollhotel@gmail.com Address: MIG149, Green Hills Rd, near Lodha, KPHB Phase 15, Kukatpally, Hyderabad, Telangana 500072, India Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy policy | Terms and Conditions | Disclaimer We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. By continuing to browse, you consent to our use of cookies. For more details, please read our Privacy Policy. Accept
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Majestic Roll Hotel 18+ Home About Us Casino Contacts Terms and Conditions Welcome to Majestic Roll Hotel. These terms and conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services. 1. General Provisions These terms and conditions apply to all users of our website and services. Majestic Roll Hotel reserves the right to update these terms at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for any changes. Continued use of our website and services after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms. 2. Booking and Reservations When you make a booking with Majestic Roll Hotel, you will be required to provide personal information, including your name, contact details, and payment information. You must ensure that all information provided is accurate and complete. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any booking at our discretion. All bookings are subject to availability and acceptance by us. 3. Payment and Cancellations All bookings must be guaranteed with a valid credit card. Full payment for your stay is required upon check-in. Cancellation policies vary depending on the rate and dates of your reservation. Please refer to your booking confirmation for specific details. Failure to cancel a reservation within the specified time frame may result in charges. 4. Check-in and Check-out Check-in time is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is by 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. Guests must present a valid ID and the credit card used for booking upon check-in. 5. Guest Conduct Guests are expected to conduct themselves in a respectful and lawful manner at all times. Any form of harassment, vandalism, or disruptive behavior will not be tolerated and may result in eviction without refund. Guests are responsible for any damages caused to hotel property during their stay. 6. Use of Hotel Facilities Our hotel offers various facilities for the enjoyment of our guests, including a spa, pool, fitness center, and dining establishments. Use of these facilities is subject to availability and specific terms. Guests must adhere to all posted rules and instructions provided by staff. The hotel is not responsible for any injuries or accidents that occur while using these facilities. 7. Personal Belongings Guests are responsible for the safekeeping of their personal belongings. Majestic Roll Hotel is not liable for any loss, theft, or damage to personal items. Safety deposit boxes are available in guest rooms and at the front desk for your convenience. 8. Privacy and Data Protection We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for detailed information on how we collect, use, and protect your data. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described in our Privacy Policy. 9. Limitation of Liability Majestic Roll Hotel shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or services. This includes, but is not limited to, damages for loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses. In no event shall our liability exceed the amount paid by you for the services in question. 10. Force Majeure Majestic Roll Hotel is not liable for any failure to perform its obligations due to circumstances beyond its reasonable control, including natural disasters, acts of terrorism, war, or any other force majeure event. In such cases, we reserve the right to cancel or modify reservations without liability. 11. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the country in which the hotel is located. Any disputes arising from or related to these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that country. 12. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at: Email: majesticrollhotel@gmail.com Address: MIG149, Green Hills Rd, near Lodha, KPHB Phase 15, Kukatpally, Hyderabad, Telangana 500072, India 13. Entire Agreement These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and Majestic Roll Hotel regarding your use of our website and services. Any prior agreements, understandings, or representations are superseded by these terms. If any provision of these terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
